info.label: Software Engineer - Ruby developer
info.brief: I'm a French software engineer that lives in Brisbane, Australia. I am 27, speak fluent English and I have a Master's degree in Computer Science from one of the top Computer Engineering schools of France. I am a ruby developer (Ruby on Rails, Grape API...) with strong software and cloud architecture skills, I am anElixir enthusiast (functional programming), and I am also trying to up my skills with front-end technologies like React or Relay. My technology monitoring skills is also much appreciated as I know very well what is going on in our industry. On a personal note, I have played baseball all my life, including one year in California in college (where I injured my shoulder then came back to France to finish my Computer Science studies). I now play competitive Baseball and coach a youth team here in Brisbane for my spare time.

highlights: Managed a developer team based in India from France

projects.title: Adomatic
projects.description: Developing a solution to convert your existing print Ad inventory into HTML5 content

projects.title: Global Sourcing Renault
projects.description: In charge of a vehicle saling application for RENAULT's employees (as a consultant with Sogeti).
projects.summary: Evolution design, technical specifications, and management of an Off-Shore development team in India. Also testing, deployement actions, bug management.

projects.title: Air France Check-In
projects.description: Developer in charge of a test automaton for the new passenger check-in system for Air France and SkyTeam (KLM, Alitaliaâ€¦.)
projects.summary: Development and maintenance of a test automaton. Discussions with the KLM dev team to help them develop their own automaton. The automaton was taking over every interface (Desk, Internet portal, self check-in).

projects.title: Paris Universite Club Baseball web app
projects.description: Creating a new web application for the Paris Baseball Club
projects.summary: Design, implementation, deployment of a web app for the Paris Baseball Softball and Cricket club. Providing blogs, emails and player management tools for the amateur club
